name: Death Shot (itch)
description:
Hey there, my name is Jarron Polonio and this is the game I made for the Wowie Jam 3.0. I hope you enjoy this short experience, and don't forget to rank this game, and others as the game jam is going on. If you want to see more content like this, then make sure to check out my YouTube Channel or my itch page.

Enter the depths of a facility where everyone's out to sustain your life force, research your abilities, and release you to rain havoc unto the world. To prevent this from happening, you need to find a way to permanently destroy yourself. So you tread deeper and deeper into the depths of certain doom, looking for answers...

Credits:
Made using Construct 3.

Audio made using BeepBox.

Art, audio, and visual coding by Jarron Polonio.
